function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Utilizing multi-source data, such as network news data, global event databases, and remote sensing data, may pose privacy and data security risks.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive personal data, potential exploitation, and breach of privacy.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data security measures, anonymize sensitive data, and restrict access to authorized personnel only.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, and access control mechanisms.","People":"General public, individuals whose data is being collected.","Owner":"Research institution, data protection authorities."},{"Description":"Mapping socioeconomic data and grid areas may raise concerns about the misuse of economic and resource allocation information.","Impact":"Misuse of sensitive economic data, unfair resource allocation, and potential exploitation of economic vulnerabilities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict access control, anonymize sensitive data, and conduct ethical oversight of data usage.","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control mechanisms, and audit trails.","People":"Public, government authorities, researchers.","Owner":"Research institution, government authorities."},{"Description":"Analyzing crowd aggregation and interaction may lead to an increased risk of disease propagation if not handled carefully.","Impact":"Unintentional facilitation of disease spread, failure to contain outbreaks, and increased infection rates.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management strategies, enforce public health guidelines, and utilize contact tracing technologies.","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, contact tracing apps, crowd monitoring systems.","People":"General public, event organizers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Public health authorities, event organizers."}]}
